forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. ESE winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening changing to rain showers later on. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. The rain and snow will change to rain showers overnight. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow flurries and snow showers, especially overnight hours. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
